name: Vi N.-N. Tran
content: Tran, Ngoc Nha Vi | UiT Skip to main content Unit startpage Employees Ngoc Nha Vi Tran Associate Professor Department of Computer Science vi.n.tran@uit.no +4777646332 Tromsø You can find me here Ngoc Nha Vi Tran About Research and teaching Find me here Job description Dr. Vi Ngoc-Nha Tran is an Associate Professor of Computer Science at UiT The Arctic University of Norway and a member of the Steering Group for NORA.startup. She earned her Ph.D. in Computer Science from UiT and was a visiting scholar at the Department of Computer Science at Rutgers University, USA. Dr. Tran was awarded a full Erasmus Mundus scholarship for an European M.Sc. in Software Engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology in Sweden and the Technical University of Kaiserslautern in Germany. Her research interests include high-performance and energy-efficient computing, machine learning, and bioinformatics.
